Duplicate cluster was updated by VeronikaLee in project Codio.
codio-6450 When trying to access a projects settings from dashboard - error Created by Ian Jobling
click gear icon to access project settings and 'Stack not found' error shown
codio-6450 (Created by Ian Jobling)
now we have such cases:
⏎
project is created from stack - stack is deleted - box = clonable - fork project - stack is shown as empty, but there is still smth (I mean project has stack)⏎
⏎
@joelmoss @AndreyNikitin @iyashtykov if it is ok - can be shipped
